repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] William M. (William Matson) Roth Papers , M0333, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: United States Ambassador, American businessman, negotiator.

scopecontent.p: Includes confidential voting records on trade.

did.unittitle: Trade Balance 1968
Notice of Public Hearings, 1963-68
Trade File, 1969
Correspondence, reports, press releases, clippings, speeches
Miscellaneous publications
1963-65Trade & economic journals
Miscellaneous Publications 1960-66, 1969

Books, pamphlets, annual reports published by trade associations, such as Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development, Committee for Economic Development, European Committee for Economic and Social Progress, European Free Trade Assocation, Twentieth Century Fund, and United Nations Association.
Miscellaneous U.S. Government Publications, 1962-1973

scopecontent.p: Includes publications from Committee on Trade of the National Citizen's Commission on International Cooperation (1965), Commerce Department (1963), Special Committee on U.S. Trade Relations with East European Countries and the Soviet Union (1965), Office of the Special Representative for Trade Negotiations (1963), and Commission on International Trade and Investment Policy (1971).

Also includes congressional hearings and reports from the Joint Economic Committee (1970, 1973), Senate Committee on Government Operations (1971, 1972), House Committee on Ways and Means (1973), House Committee on Foreign Affairs (1972), and Trade Expansion Act of 1962.

scopecontent.p: Major recommendations, printed draft, and 8 copies of final printed edition.
